contents.text: Thank you for calling Rithm School in San Francisco, where our mission is to help you become an exceptional developer.
To speak with our admissions team and learn about enrollment, press 1.
For details on the application process and prerequisites, press 1.
All of our enrollment advisors are currently assisting other callers. Please hold and we will connect you shortly.

navigationGoals: I need to speak with admissions to clarify the application prerequisites.
I want to speak with admissions to discuss applying and how my military experience meets the prerequisite requirements
Clarify the technical prerequisites and step-by-step application timeline for the full-stack program
I need help understanding the application requirements and prerequisites for enrollment.
I’d like to speak with admissions to clarify course prerequisites and start my application

contents.text: For information on tuition, scholarships, and financing options, press 2.
Our financial aid specialists are busy at the moment. Please stay on the line and we will be with you soon.

navigationGoals: I want details on tuition fees, scholarships, and payment plans.
I need information on tuition, veteran scholarships, GI Bill benefits, and financing options
Get a detailed breakdown of tuition fees, available scholarships, and financing plans
I need details on tuition fees and possible scholarships or financing options.
I need details on tuition costs and scholarship opportunities

contents.text: For assistance with current student services, press 2.
To inquire about class schedules and curriculum updates, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our student support team.

navigationGoals: I need to get the upcoming class schedule and curriculum updates as a current student.
I’d like to get the latest class schedules and curriculum updates and ask about veteran accommodations
Retrieve the upcoming cohort’s class schedule and any recent curriculum revisions
I want to review the upcoming class schedules and any curriculum updates.
I want to check my class schedule and any recent curriculum updates

contents.text: For career services and job placement support, press 2.
Thank you for your patience. Connecting you to our career services advisor now.

navigationGoals: I want to connect with career services to discuss job placement opportunities.
I’m looking to connect with a career services advisor for job placement support tailored to veterans
Connect with a career services advisor to discuss job placement statistics and recruiting partnerships
I’m looking for information on career services and job placement assistance after graduation.
I’m seeking career support and job placement advice
